snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 440: The Fugitives (SAGE2004)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: The Fugitives - SAGE2004
Credit: SupaChao (Blue Flame Productions)
Release Date: March 14th 2004

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: Only on Site.

00:00 - Logo&Title
01:01 - Character Select
01:20 - Mode Select
01:32 - Training Lesson & Boss
05:30 - Cutscene
05:52 - Heroes Cave Zone Act 1
08:47 - Heroes Cave Zone Act 2 & Boss
11:39 - Ending

NOTES: Can you FEEL the Rhythm & Emotion with the beat of your heart?!
It reaches out to you so far away!
No? Well "The Fugitives" here are feeling the beat in their heart alright!
Or... At least Sonic is! Shadow is having a vacation.
SO ANYWAY, the world has been been overrun by Gizoids that don't move much at all OH NO!
We must take our base back and then some!
SO what this game you might ask?
WELL It's a fancy art style looking old game where you Destroy Gizoids via an award winning Pinball SoundFX!
And interesting Midi choices to boot! THIS is... THE FUGITIVES!
*Cough* Okay for real tho.
The game has nice choice of Midi music this time around.
Art Style sticks out for sure.
Gameplay is not ground breaking but not too bad in level design and has some Story to it.
Now what are the negatives? Well the physics are not quite polished as you get stuck a bit too often.
The hit boxes for the Gizoid's are also not that great and the game window is very small and cannot be moved.
While I think this game is pretty neat for the most part, it however did not make it past SAGE2004.
Apparently due to Damizean being the lead programmer and took a supposed break and this game died because of it.
To which I find that to be bizarre as one can build more on top of the already existing content.
Maybe lack of sprite artists as well caused a downfall I cannot confirm as not a lot of info survived for this game.
The game was also gonna let you Punch enemies I believe.
Overall cool but sadly was abandoned.

(ISSUES)

1. The Physics are not very polished so Sonic can get softlocked in several floor collision moments.
2. It's possible to softlock during the boss if you somehow manage to get knocked out of the screen.

(PASSWORDS)

On Site.
